meanings.definition: Having great physical power or strength.
meanings.sent1: He is the strongest man in the gym.
meanings.sent2: She lifted the heaviest weight because she is the strongest.
meanings.sent3: The little ant thought he was the strongest insect in the garden.
meanings.sent4: The lion is known as the strongest animal in the jungle.
meanings.sent5: The oak tree stood tall and strong, the strongest in the forest.

meanings.definition: Most intense or extreme in degree.
meanings.sent1: The storm was the strongest one we had ever experienced.
meanings.sent2: Her strongest emotion was fear when she saw the spider.
meanings.sent3: The smell of the strongest cheese made her wrinkle her nose.
meanings.sent4: His strongest desire was to travel the world and see new places.
meanings.sent5: The strongest wind blew the leaves off the trees, creating a whirlwind.

meanings.definition: Most effective or powerful in a particular situation.
meanings.sent1: Her strongest argument convinced everyone to change their minds.
meanings.sent2: The strongest medicine finally cured his illness.
meanings.sent3: The strongest glue held the broken pieces of the vase together.
meanings.sent4: His strongest weapon in the game was his strategic thinking.
meanings.sent5: The strongest light illuminated the dark room, revealing hidden treasures.
